clipboardHistory.value:
# Check for NVIDIA GPU using lspci
if lspci | grep -iq "nvidia"; then
    # Send notification if NVIDIA GPU is found
    notify-send "NVIDIA GPU Detected" "Exported variables"
    export __GL_GSYNC_ALLOWED=1
    export GBM_BACKEND=nvidia-drm
    export NVD_BACKEND=direct
    export ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT=auto
    export MOZ_DISABLE_RDD_SANDBOX=1
    export WLR_DRM_NO_ATOMIC=0
    export AQ_DRM_DEVICES=/dev/dri/card1:/dev/dri/card0
else
    # Send notification if no NVIDIA GPU is found
    notify-send "No NVIDIA GPU" "No NVIDIA graphics card was detected."
fi

# NVIDIA environment variables
NVIDIA_VARS=(
    "__GL_GSYNC_ALLOWED,1"
    "GBM_BACKEND,nvidia-drm"
    "NVD_BACKEND,direct"
    "ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT,auto"
    "MOZ_DISABLE_RDD_SANDBOX,1"
    "WLR_DRM_NO_ATOMIC,0"
)

# Check for NVIDIA GPU
if lspci | grep -iq "nvidia"; then
    # Clean existing NVIDIA settings
    for var in "${NVIDIA_VARS[@]}"; do
        var_name="${var%,*}"
        sed -i "/^env = ${var_name}/d" "$HYPR_ENV_FILE" 2>/dev/null
    done

    # Append new NVIDIA settings
    {
        echo -e "\n# NVIDIA-specific environment variables"
        for var in "${NVIDIA_VARS[@]}"; do
            echo "env = ${var}"
        done
    } >> "$HYPR_ENV_FILE"
    
    notify-send "NVIDIA Config Applied" "Hyprland environment variables configured for NVIDIA" -i nvidia
else
    # Remove NVIDIA settings if no GPU found
    for var in "${NVIDIA_VARS[@]}"; do
        var_name="${var%,*}"
        sed -i "/^env = ${var_name}/d" "$HYPR_ENV_FILE" 2>/dev/null
    done
    
    notify-send "NVIDIA Settings Removed" "Cleaned NVIDIA-specific variables" -i dialog-warning
fi

# Clean up empty lines and ensure trailing newline
sed -i '/^$/d' "$HYPR_ENV_FILE"
echo "" >> "$HYPR_ENV_FILE"

#!/bin/bash

HYPR_ENV_FILE="$HOME/.config/hypr/env.conf"

# Create config directory if missing
mkdir -p ~/.config/hypr

# NVIDIA environment variables
NVIDIA_VARS=(
    "__GL_GSYNC_ALLOWED,1"
    "GBM_BACKEND,nvidia-drm"
    "NVD_BACKEND,direct"
    "ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT,auto"
    "MOZ_DISABLE_RDD_SANDBOX,1"
    "WLR_DRM_NO_ATOMIC,0"
)

# Check for NVIDIA GPU
if lspci | grep -iq "nvidia"; then
    # Clean existing NVIDIA settings
    for var in "${NVIDIA_VARS[@]}"; do
        var_name="${var%,*}"
        sed -i "/^env = ${var_name}/d" "$HYPR_ENV_FILE" 2>/dev/null
    done

    # Append new NVIDIA settings
    {
        echo -e "\n# NVIDIA-specific environment variables"
        for var in "${NVIDIA_VARS[@]}"; do
            echo "env = ${var}"
        done
    } >> "$HYPR_ENV_FILE"
    
    notify-send "NVIDIA Config Applied" "Hyprland environment variables configured for NVIDIA" -i nvidia
else
    # Remove NVIDIA settings if no GPU found
    for var in "${NVIDIA_VARS[@]}"; do
        var_name="${var%,*}"
        sed -i "/^env = ${var_name}/d" "$HYPR_ENV_FILE" 2>/dev/null
    done
    
    notify-send "NVIDIA Settings Removed" "Cleaned NVIDIA-specific variables" -i dialog-warning
fi

# Clean up empty lines and ensure trailing newline
sed -i '/^$/d' "$HYPR_ENV_FILE"
echo "" >> "$HYPR_ENV_FILE"

export __GL_GSYNC_ALLOWED=1
    export GBM_BACKEND=nvidia-drm
    export NVD_BACKEND=direct
    export ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT=auto
    export MOZ_DISABLE_RDD_SANDBOX=1
    export WLR_DRM_NO_ATOMIC=0

# export __GL_GSYNC_ALLOWED=1
# export GBM_BACKEND=nvidia-drm
# export NVD_BACKEND=direct
# export ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT=auto
# export MOZ_DISABLE_RDD_SANDBOX=1

if lspci | grep -iq "nvidia"; then
    # Send desktop notification
    notify-send "NVIDIA GPU Detected" "An NVIDIA GPU is present in your system."

fi

# Check for NVIDIA GPU using lspci
if lspci | grep -iq "nvidia"; then
    # Send notification if NVIDIA GPU is found
    notify-send "NVIDIA GPU Detected" "An NVIDIA GPU is present in your system."
else
    # Send notification if no NVIDIA GPU is found
    notify-send "No NVIDIA GPU" "No NVIDIA graphics card was detected."
fi

if lspci | grep -iq "nvidia"; then
    # Send desktop notification
    notify-send "NVIDIA GPU Detected" "An NVIDIA GPU is present in your system."
fi
